0.title: No Cardiac Disease Detected
0.summary: Your predicted disease level is low. Maintain a healthy lifestyle.
suggestions: Drink plenty of water and follow a balanced diet.
Avoid smoking and limit alcohol use.

1.title: Mild Cardiac Risk Identified
1.summary: Some mild risk factors detected. Lifestyle improvement is recommended.
suggestions: Reduce salt, sugar, and fatty foods.
Monitor blood pressure once a week.
Avoid junk food and increase fruit intake.

2.title: Moderate Risk
2.summary: Moderate cardiac indicators found. Close monitoring is needed.
suggestions: Monitor symptoms like chest pain or shortness of breath.

3.title: High Risk
3.summary: High cardiac risk predicted. Immediate medical attention recommended.
suggestions: Avoid heavy physical activity until cleared by doctor.
Seek emergency care if chest pain occurs.

default.title: General Health Advice
default.summary: Maintain a healthy lifestyle and consult a doctor if needed.
